__TOC__

* Regular <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/IRCMeetings/2011-01-19|Monthly IRC Meeting]]</nowiki> was held at 8pm Irish time on Wednesday 19th January 2011.
 
* The Ubuntu Ireland LoCo Podcast crew released their first podcast .

* On Wednesday 26th of January the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/646/detail/| Dublin ]]</nowiki> Ubuntu Hour took place at 19:00 in the Trinity Capital Hotel. Some photos from the event can be found <nowiki>[[ http:--pix.ie-ubuntuie-album-400133 | here]]</nowiki>

* On Thursday 27th of January the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/647/detail/| Limerick ]]</nowiki> Ubuntu Hour took place in the Absolute Hotel at 18:00.

* On Saturday 29th January we held An Evening of Bowling and Other Fun. This was a break away from our traditional pub events. Great fun was had in the <nowiki>[[http://www.leisureplex.ie/product.php?page=bowling| Stillorgan Leisureplex ]]</nowiki>. Some photos from the event can be found <nowiki>[[ http:--www.flickr.com-photos-rorymccann-5406900621- | here]]</nowiki> & <nowiki>[[ http:--pix.ie-ubuntuie-album-400293 | here ]]</nowiki>
